cleaned_text: - 40 Capsules (12 grams total) - Powdered Mushroom Capsules - 100% Natural Mushrooms Mammoth Mushrooms believes that mushrooms can be a powerful tool for personal growth and insight. We also know that microdosing is a great way to enhance many recreational activities. Mammoth Mushrooms uses mushrooms grown in a controlled lab to ensure the highest quality, potency and consistency.
